elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: You notice how a colleague from your class forwards a video via social media to the person next to you on the bench showing a fight on a bus: a group of young people provoke a boy and beat him up.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: What sentence could the boy formulate to express his desired behavior to your colleague?

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: What sentence could you formulate to express your desired behavior to your colleague?

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: A classmate has downloaded the profile picture of a fellow pupil, altered it with a moustache and rose-colored glasses and then posted it in the class chat. The class finds the picture funny and laughs, while the person in question gets angry.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What sentence could the person concerned formulate to express their desired behavior to your classmate?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What sentence could you formulate to express your desired behavior to your classmate?

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: You observe how a classmate hides someone else's cell phone in the teacher's desk during the break. When the cell phone owner comes back, he shouts: "Who took my cell phone? Hey, that's not funny ..."

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What sentence could the cell phone owner formulate to express his desired behavior to your classmate?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What sentence could you formulate to express your desired behavior to your classmate?

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Five of them are standing in a circle during the break when a burly classmate approaches a smaller pupil from behind, clutches him tightly and says: "Hey, you fine fellow, are we OK today?" You can see how the person being clutched waits until the "attack" is over and looks visibly unhappy.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What sentence could the person in the clutch formulate to express their desired behavior to your classmate?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What sentence could you formulate to express your desired behavior to your classmate?

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: You hear a classmate accompanied by two colleagues say to a female classmate who is eating a chocolate bar: "Hey Pummeli, are you getting fatter?" The two colleagues laugh out loud.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What sentence could the classmate formulate to express her desired behavior to the group?

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What sentence could you formulate to express your desired behavior to the group?
